taskbody.context: You can register a new subscription key before your existing subscription expires.

step.cmd: In main menu, select Help Register Subscription... .
step.stepresult: The following dialog appears:Register Subscription Dialog

step.cmd: If you don't have a subscription key yet, click on the Purchase Subscription button to open Maxprograms Online Store on your internet browser.
If you have a Subscription Key, type it in the Subscription Key text box and click the Register Subscription button.
step.stepresult: On registration success, The following dialog appears:Subscription Registered Dialog
